doc.title: phylip

description.text: PHYLIP is a package of programs for inferring phylogenies.

doc.reference: Felsenstein, J. 1993. PHYLIP (Phylogeny Inference Package) version 3.5c. Distributed by the author. Department of Genetics, University of Washington, Seattle.
Felsenstein, J. 1989. PHYLIP -- Phylogeny Inference Package (Version 3.2). Cladistics 5: 164-166.

description.text: Plots a cladogram- or phenogram-like rooted tree

comment.text: DRAWGRAM interactively plots a cladogram- or phenogram-like rooted tree diagram, with many options including orientation of tree and branches, style of tree, label sizes and angles, tree depth, margin sizes, stem lengths, and placement of nodes in the tree. Particularly if you can use your computer to preview the plot, you can very effectively adjust the details of the plotting to get just the kind of plot you want.

xhtml:div.div:
Example data (click on [use example data] to load):
(A,(B,(H,(D,(J,(((G,E),(F,I)),C))))));

xhtml:div.label: Which plotter or printer will the tree be drawn on (P) Postscript printer file format (L) PICT format (M) HP Laserjet PCL file format (J) MS-Windows Bitmap (W) TeKtronix 4010 graphics terminal (K) Hewlett-Packard pen plotter (H) DEC ReGIS graphics (D) Houston Instruments plotter (B) Epson MX-80 dot-matrix printer (E) Prowriter/Imagewriter dot-matrix printer (C) Okidata dot-matrix printer (O) Toshiba 24-pin dot-matrix printer (T) PCX file format (P) X Bitmap format (X) FIG 2.0 format (F) Idraw drawing program format (A) VRML Virtual Reality Markup Language file (Z) POVRAY 3D rendering program file (V) Rayshade 3D rendering program file (R)

Default value: Automatically rescaled
Depth/Breadth of tree (D)

Stem-length/tree-depth (T)?
Enter the stem length as fraction of tree depth (a value between 0.0 and 1.0).

Character ht / tip space (C)?
Enter character height as fraction of tip spacing.
Ancestral nodes (A) Intermediate (I) Weighted (W) Centered (C) Inner (N) So tree is V-shaped (V)
